properties.areaDesc: Northern Monterey Bay; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast; San Francisco Peninsula Coast; San Francisco; Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore
properties.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 10 at 9:40PM PST until January 12 at 3:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
...Large long-period northwest swells arriving this weekend...

A large swell train from the Gulf of Alaska will arrive on
Saturday. Northwest swells will increase to 13 to 15 ft Saturday
morning with a period of 16 to 18 seconds causing breakers as
high as 20 to 24 ft. Swells will start to decrease Sunday morning.

* WHAT...Large breaking waves of 20 to 24 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National
Seashore, Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast, San
Francisco Peninsula Coast, San Francisco and Northern Monterey
Bay Counties.

* WHEN...From 9 AM Saturday to 3 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and
localized beach erosion.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to
dangerous surf conditions.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM SATURDAY TO 3 PM PST SUNDAY
